text: I seem to be having an OAuth2 issue where I cannot see any pages after successful authentication. I am using the pages endpoint and passing the key/access token...fyi blog posts is working for me just fine seems like just pages stopped working today.

Hey, <@U504BHZ6K>! Your report sounds similar to this behavior: <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/APIs-Integrations/quot-List-Pages-quot-content-api-v2-pages-endpoint-not-giving/m-p/298674/highlight/true#M28056>. Can you confirm?
